entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .LastIndexOf returns incorrect value #28815

Closed

  • Blazor Hybrid - Publish error NETSDK1152 for Microsoft.Web.WebView2 using EF Core 8 #20677
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] Overriding back button functionality with OnBackButtonPressed returning false in a modally pushed page causes stack overflow - fix #28812
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation, area-controls-modal

Updated

  • [Android] SpacingItemDecoration improvement #27093
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview
  • [iOS][Shell][More Tab] Navigation from the 'More' tab - improvements #27932
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Picker Selected item gets cleared in BindableLayout - Fix #26777
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-picker, .NET 9 SR7
  • Pickers Inside CollectionView get SelectedItem Cleared on Scrolling - UITest #26775
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • [iOS] Flyout Items Not Displayed in RightToLeft FlowDirection in Landscape - fix #26762
    area-controls-flyoutpage, community ✨
  • [Android] Unable to scroll inner CollectionView of nested CollectionViews - fix #26738
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Flyout Icon - RTL support #26737
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-flyoutpage, community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • [iOS] Replaced MeasureInvalidated with IPlatformMeasureInvalidationController for Shell Flyout's Footer #28775
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell
  • Android TimePicker ignores 24 hour system setting when using Format Property - fix #28797
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker
  • [Android][NET 10] Fix: Ensure Image consumes touches properly #28429
    proposal/open, platform/android 🤖, area-image, community ✨, area-gestures
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #28203
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
